import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useLocation,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{GiHamburgerMenu}from'react-icons/gi';import{ImCross}from'react-icons/im';import{IoMdArrowDropdown}from'react-icons/io';import images from'../../constants/images';import'./Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[toggleMenu,setToggleMenu]=useState(false);const[isFixed,setIsFixed]=useState(false);const[isServicesOpen,setIsServicesOpen]=useState(false);const location=useLocation();const navigate=useNavigate();// Handle scroll to add shadow to navbar
const handleScroll=()=>{setIsFixed(window.scrollY>100);};useEffect(()=>{window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);},[]);// Navigate to home or scroll to top

console.log('Adjusted position:',adjustedPosition);window.scrollTo({top:adjustedPosition,behavior:'smooth'});}}else{// Navigate to homepage, then scroll

console.log('Section top position (post navigation):',sectionTop);console.log('Navbar height (post navigation):',navbarHeight);const adjustedPosition=sectionTop-navbarHeight;console.log('Adjusted position (post navigation):',adjustedPosition);window.scrollTo({top:adjustedPosition,behavior:'smooth'});}},100);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:`z-nav navbar bg-white ${isFixed?'shadow-md':''}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center cursor-pointer",onClick:handleLogoClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:images.cinegraphics,alt:"app logo",className:"logo",style:{marginTop:0}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"hidden lg:flex justify-center items-center gap-20 mr-[1rem]",children:[['ABOUT US','PROJECTS'].map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"text-black font-cairo hover:text-primary-orange cursor-pointer",onClick:()=>handleNavigation(`#${item.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g,'')}`),children:item},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"relative",onMouseEnter:()=>setIsServicesOpen(true)// Open dropdown on hover
,onMouseLeave:()=>setIsServicesOpen(false)// Close dropdown on hover out
,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-black font-cairo flex gap-2 cursor-pointer hover:text-primary-orange",onClick:()=>handleNavigation('#services')// Scroll to services section
,children:["OUR SERVICES",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IoMdArrowDropdown,{className:"mt-1"})]}),isServicesOpen&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"absolute top-full left-0 w-48 font-cairo bg-white border shadow-md mt-2 p-2 rounded-md",children:[{name:'Digital Marketing',path:''},{name:'Graphic Design',path:''},{name:'Motion Graphics',path:''},{name:'Game Development',path:''},{name:'Walkthroughs and Cinematics',path:'/walkthroughs'},{name:'Interior Design',path:'/interiors'},{name:'Creative Visualization',path:'/creative'}// { name: 'Digital Marketing', path: '/services/digital-marketing' },
].map((service,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"text-primary-blue hover:text-primary-orange cursor-pointer py-1",onClick:()=>{navigate(service.path);// Redirect to the respective service page
},children:service.name},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"text-black font-cairo hover:text-primary-orange cursor-pointer",onClick:()=>handleNavigation('#contactus'),children:"CONTACT US"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ham",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GiHamburgerMenu,{color:"#000",fontSize:27,onClick:()=>setToggleMenu(true)}),toggleMenu&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"toggle slide-bottom fixed top-0 left-0 h-screen bg-primary-black text-white flex flex-col items-center z-50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ImCross,{className:"absolute top-5 right-5 cursor-pointer",color:"#fff",fontSize:27,onClick:()=>setToggleMenu(false)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"list-none mt-20 space-y-8",children:[['Home','About Us','Projects','Services'].map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"text-2xl font-bold cursor-pointer hover:text-primary-orange",onClick:()=>{handleNavigation(`#${item.toLowerCase().replace(/\s+/g,'')}`);setToggleMenu(false);},children:item},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"text-2xl font-bold cursor-pointer hover:text-primary-orange",onClick:()=>{handleNavigation('#contactus');setToggleMenu(false);},children:"Contact Us"})]})]})]})]});};export default Navbar;
